title: T216 Plank SGC A, T201 Cicotte For Sale

posts.post_title: T216 Plank SGC A, T201 Cicotte For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hello I have a T216 Eddie Plank for sale. It has obvious wear but still a presentable image and good back. Price is 285/BO shipped. I also have a raw T201 of Cicotte/Thoney for sale for $40 shipped. Scans can be viewed in the FS/FT folder in my signature line.
                                            Thanks,
                                              Steve
